posed_portraits::preview_card_0::header: Most portraits frame your subject to occupy about 50 percent of the frame.
posed_portraits::title: Posed Portaits
posed_portraits::markdown_card_0::text: When you upload your portrait it will be shared with the StoryMaker community. [Check out portraits made by other StoryMakers here.](https://www.storymaker.org/)
posed_portraits::intro_card_0::headline: Posed Portraits
posed_portraits::clip_card_0::goals[1]: Include something to help us learn about your character.
posed_portraits::text_card_1::text: Now it's your turn, try to capture a portrait of your own.
posed_portraits::text_card_0::text: Share a portrait of someone you know with the StoryMaker Community, find out how!
posed_portraits::preview_card_1::header: A good portrait tells us something about the character or story.
posed_portraits::clip_card_0::goals[0]: Have your subject fill 50% of the frame.
